verses.verse: And all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> lifted<WH5375> up their voice,<WH6963> and cried;<WH5414> and the people<WH5971> wept<WH1058> that night.<WH3915>

And all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> murmured<WH3885> against<WH5921> Moses<WH4872> and against<WH5921> Aaron:<WH175> and the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> said<WH559> to them, Would<WH3863> God that we had died<WH4191> in the land<WH776> of Egypt!<WH4714> or would<WH3863> God we had died<WH4191> in this<WH2088> wilderness!<WH4057>

And why<WH4100> has the LORD<WH3068> brought<WH935> us to this<WH2063> land,<WH776> to fall<WH5307> by the sword,<WH2719> that our wives<WH802> and our children<WH2945> should be a prey?<WH957> were it not better<WH2896> for us to return<WH7725> into Egypt?<WH4714>
And they said<WH559> one<WH376> to another,<WH251> Let us make<WH5414> a captain,<WH7218> and let us return<WH7725> into Egypt.<WH4714>
Then Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> fell<WH5307> on<WH5921> their faces<WH6440> before<WH6440> all<WH3605> the assembly<WH6951> of the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh,<WH3312> which were of them that searched<WH8446> the land,<WH776> rent<WH7167> their clothes:<WH899>

And they spoke<WH559> to all<WH3605> the company<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> The land,<WH776> which<WH834> we passed<WH5674> through to search<WH8446> it, is an exceeding<WH3966> good<WH2896> land.<WH776>

If<WH518> the LORD<WH3068> delight<WH2654> in us, then he will bring<WH935> us into<WH413> this<WH2063> land,<WH776> and give<WH5414> it us; a land<WH776> which<WH834> flows<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>

Only<WH389> rebel<WH4775> not you against the LORD,<WH3068> neither<WH408> fear<WH3372> you the people<WH5971> of the land;<WH776> for they are bread<WH3899> for us: their defense<WH6738> is departed<WH5493> from them, and the LORD<WH3068> is with us: fear<WH3372> them not.

But all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> bade<WH559> stone<WH7275> them with stones.<WH68> And the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH413> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> How<WH5704> long<WH5704> will this<WH2088> people<WH5971> provoke<WH5006> me? and how<WH5704> long<WH5704> will it be ere<WH3808> they believe<WH539> me, for all<WH3605> the signs<WH226> which<WH834> I have showed<WH6213> among<WH7130> them?
I will smite<WH5221> them with the pestilence,<WH1698> and disinherit<WH3423> them, and will make<WH6213> of you a greater<WH1419> nation<WH1471> and mightier<WH6099> than they.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the LORD,<WH3068> Then the Egyptians<WH4714> shall hear<WH8085> it, (for you brought<WH5927> up this<WH2088> people<WH5971> in your might<WH3581> from among<WH7130> them;)

And they will tell<WH559> it to the inhabitants<WH3427> of this<WH2063> land:<WH776> for they have heard<WH8085> that you LORD<WH3068> are among<WH7130> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> that you LORD<WH3068> are seen<WH7200> face<WH5869> to face,<WH5869> and that your cloud<WH6051> stands<WH5975> over<WH5921> them, and that you go<WH1980> before<WH6440> them, by day<WH3119> time in a pillar<WH5982> of a cloud,<WH6051> and in a pillar<WH5982> of fire<WH784> by night.<WH3915>

Now if you shall kill<WH4191> all this<WH2088> people<WH5971> as one<WH259> man,<WH376> then the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> have heard<WH8085> the fame<WH8088> of you will speak,<WH559> saying,<WH559>

Because<WH1115> the LORD<WH3068> was not able<WH3201> to bring<WH935> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> he swore<WH7650> to them, therefore he has slain<WH7819> them in the wilderness.<WH4057>
And now,<WH6258> I beseech<WH4994> you, let the power<WH3581> of my LORD<WH136> be great,<WH1431> according as you have spoken,<WH1696> saying,<WH559>

The LORD<WH3068> is long-suffering,<WH750> <WH639> and of great<WH7227> mercy,<WH2617> forgiving<WH5375> iniquity<WH5771> and transgression,<WH6588> and by no<WH3808> means clearing<WH5352> the guilty, visiting<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> of the fathers<WH1> on the children<WH1121> to the third<WH8029> and fourth<WH7256> generation.

Pardon,<WH5545> I beseech<WH4994> you, the iniquity<WH5771> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> according to the greatness<WH1433> of your mercy,<WH2617> and as you have forgiven<WH5375> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> from Egypt<WH4714> even until<WH5704> now.<WH2008>
And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> I have pardoned<WH5545> according to your word:<WH1697>
But as truly<WH199> as I live,<WH2416> all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> shall be filled<WH4390> with the glory<WH3519> of the LORD.<WH3068>

Because<WH3588> all<WH3605> those<WH582> men<WH582> which have seen<WH7200> my glory,<WH3519> and my miracles,<WH226> which<WH834> I did<WH6213> in Egypt<WH4714> and in the wilderness,<WH4057> and have tempted<WH5254> me now<WH2088> these<WH2088> ten<WH6235> times, and have not listened<WH8085> to my voice;<WH6963>
Surely<WH518> they shall not see<WH7200> the land<WH776> which I swore<WH7650> to their fathers,<WH1> neither<WH3808> shall any<WH3605> of them that provoked<WH5006> me see<WH7200> it:

But my servant<WH5650> Caleb,<WH3612> because<WH6118> he had<WH1961> another<WH312> spirit<WH7307> with him, and has followed<WH310> me fully,<WH4392> him will I bring<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> into where<WH824> <WH8432> he went;<WH935> and his seed<WH2233> shall possess<WH3423> it.

(Now the Amalekites<WH6003> and the Canaanites<WH3669> dwelled<WH3427> in the valley.<WH6010>) Tomorrow<WH4279> turn<WH6437> you, and get<WH5265> you into the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> of the Red<WH5488> sea.<WH3220>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

How<WH5704> long<WH5704> shall I bear with this<WH2063> evil<WH7451> congregation,<WH5712> which<WH834> murmur<WH3885> against<WH5921> me? I have heard<WH8085> the murmurings<WH8519> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> they murmur<WH3885> against<WH5921> me.
Say<WH559> to them, As truly as I live,<WH2416> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> as you have spoken<WH1696> in my ears,<WH241> so<WH3651> will I do<WH6213> to you:

Your carcasses<WH6297> shall fall<WH5307> in this<WH2088> wilderness;<WH4057> and all<WH3605> that were numbered<WH6485> of you, according to your whole<WH3605> number,<WH4557> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward <WH4605>which<WH834> have murmured<WH3885> against<WH5921> me.

Doubtless<WH518> you shall not come<WH935> into<WH413> the land,<WH776> concerning which<WH834> I swore<WH5375> to make you dwell<WH7931> therein, save<WH3588> <WH518> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh,<WH3312> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun.<WH5126>
But your little<WH2945> ones, which you said<WH559> should be a prey,<WH957> them will I bring<WH935> in, and they shall know<WH3045> the land<WH776> which<WH834> you have despised.<WH3988>
But as for you, your carcasses,<WH6297> they shall fall<WH5307> in this<WH2088> wilderness.<WH4057>

And your children<WH1121> shall wander<WH7462> in the wilderness<WH4057> forty<WH705> years,<WH8141> and bear<WH5375> your prostitutions,<WH2184> until<WH5704> your carcasses<WH6297> be wasted<WH8552> in the wilderness.<WH4057>

After the number<WH4557> of the days<WH3117> in which<WH834> you searched<WH8446> the land,<WH776> even forty<WH705> days,<WH3117> each day<WH3117> for a year,<WH8141> shall you bear<WH5375> your iniquities,<WH5771> even forty<WH705> years,<WH8141> and you shall know<WH3045> my breach<WH8569> of promise.<WH748>

I the LORD<WH3068> have said,<WH1696> I will surely<WH518> do<WH6213> it to all<WH3605> this<WH2063> evil<WH7451> congregation,<WH5712> that are gathered<WH3259> together against<WH5921> me: in this<WH2088> wilderness<WH4057> they shall be consumed,<WH8552> and there<WH8033> they shall die.<WH4191>

And the men,<WH582> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> to search<WH8446> the land,<WH776> who returned,<WH7725> and made all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> to murmur<WH3885> against<WH5921> him, by bringing<WH3318> up a slander<WH1681> on the land,<WH776>
Even those<WH582> men<WH582> that did bring<WH3318> up the evil<WH7451> report<WH1681> on the land,<WH776> died<WH4191> by the plague<WH4046> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>

But Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh,<WH3312> which were of the men<WH582> that went<WH1980> to search<WH8446> the land,<WH776> lived<WH2421> still.
And Moses<WH4872> told<WH1696> these<WH428> sayings<WH1697> to all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> and the people<WH5971> mourned<WH56> greatly.<WH3966>

And they rose<WH7925> up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and got<WH5927> them up into<WH413> the top<WH7218> of the mountain,<WH2022> saying,<WH559> See,<WH2009> we be here, and will go<WH5927> up to the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has promised:<WH559> for we have sinned.<WH2398>
And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> Why<WH4100> now<WH2088> do you transgress<WH5674> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD?<WH3068> but it shall not prosper.<WH6743>
Go<WH5927> not up, for the LORD<WH3068> is not among<WH7130> you; that you be not smitten<WH5062> before<WH6440> your enemies.<WH341>

For the Amalekites<WH6003> and the Canaanites<WH3669> are there<WH8033> before<WH6440> you, and you shall fall<WH5307> by the sword:<WH2719> because<WH3588> you are turned<WH7725> away<WH310> from the LORD,<WH3068> therefore the LORD<WH3068> will not be with you.

But they presumed<WH6075> to go<WH5927> up to the hill<WH2022> top:<WH7218> nevertheless the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD,<WH3068> and Moses,<WH4872> departed<WH4185> not out of the camp.<WH4264>

Then the Amalekites<WH6003> came<WH3381> down,<WH3381> and the Canaanites<WH3669> which dwelled<WH3427> in that hill,<WH2022> and smote<WH5221> them, and discomfited<WH3807> them, even to Hormah.<WH2767>
